akn:section.akn:heading: Liability for acts of officers and agents

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 21011. Liability for acts of officers and agents The corporation is liable for the acts of its officers and agents acting within the scope of their authority. (Added Pub. L. 105–354, § 1(5)(A), Nov. 3, 1998, 112 Stat. 3244.)
